entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, York Factory
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 45 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 47 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 45 in the evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
